page.title: 20Llandegai School
page.content: Their favourite indoor games are leap frog, Star Wars and the girls play with Sindies (a type of doll). An average school day consists of maths, reading, writing and painting, but on Friday afternoon they can do what they want. The kitchen was built in 1943 as far as we can make out. It does not have many staff, actually only four. Two cooks work all morning and then at 11.45am. another cook comes in to help and at 12 noon the superviser comes in. They have a set menu for each month and the kitchen staff would like a microwave oven. The Parents Teachers Association (P.T.A.) provide the Christmas dinner for the children.
